com.ociweb.pronghorn.util

Class Appendables

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ociweb.pronghorn.util.Appendables

  • public class Appendables
extends Object
    Garbage free single pass utilities for building up text. The API follows a fluent pattern where every method returns the same Appendable which was passed in. TODO: as soon we we start building this code for Java 8 we muse use new UncheckedIOException(cause) instead of new RuntimeException();
    Author:
    Nathan Tippy
